summary: This document is a summary of account balances and transactions for a Deutsche Bank account over the month of November 2013. It details the account balance, deposits, withdrawals, service charges, and provides instructions for addressing errors in the account statement.

persons.name: Darren K. Indyke
persons.context: Darren K. Indyke is mentioned as the attorney associated with the trust account detailed in the document.

persons.name: Amanda Kirby
persons.context: Amanda Kirby is referenced as a contact for personal assistants related to the account.

locations: 575 Lexington Ave, 4th Fl, New York, NY 10022
keyFacts: The document summarizes account balances for a Deutsche Bank account from November 1, 2013, to November 30, 2013.
Darren K. Indyke is identified as the attorney associated with the account.
The account had a balance of $50.00 at the beginning and end of the statement period.
Service charges and fees totaling $50.00 were recorded during the month.
Instructions for reporting errors in the account statement are provided.
